name: Hogan's Alley (1984)
description: Hogan's Alley (ホーガンズアレイ, Hōganzu Arei) is a 1984 video game by Nintendo. It was one of the first games to use a light gun as an input device. The game presents players with "cardboard cut-outs" of gangsters and innocent civilians. The player must shoot the gangs and spare the innocent people.
